snippet.title: Toni Island Adventure - Official Release Date Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: In this retro 8-bit game, Toni, a pizza-loving sailor dog, is shipwrecked on the enigmatic Salamino Island. Help the islanders tackle the escalating threat of the Pepe Caldera volcano. Solve intricate puzzles, defeat scary bosses, and uncover hidden legends—all while savoring a hot slice of pizza! Check out the Toni Island Adventure trailer to see gameplay and the colorful world of this upcoming game. Toni Island Adventure will be availalbe on Steam on April 3, 2025.
